originalText.text: Dr. Moroz is very thorough and practical in his recommendations and proposed solutions.  After over a year of seeing numerous doctors and taking countless prescriptions, I was very frustrated.  It was not until I've started receiving treatments from Dr. Moroz that I have started to experience relief.  Unlike doctors of the past, I feel that I have the full, undivided attention of Dr. Moroz whenever I visit and that he takes my symptoms seriously.  I feel very fortunate to have found Dr. Moroz and to be under his care.

originalText.text: I have been receiving acupuncture treatments from Dr. Moroz for several months and the difference has been life changing. I had been experiencing nonstop physical and neurogenic pain for over twenty years with hardly any relief UNTIL acupuncture from Dr. Moroz and his team. True, most insurances may not cover it, but if you suffer from any manner of pain, unless you think money can be better spent than on one's health, I believe you will be glad you gave this group a chance. Of great importance, not all acupuncture are created equal: I had tried acupuncture before, and it did nothing for me. Also, Dr. Moroz has a wonderful team working with him, including highly skilled interns, and I must also mention his assistant, Yvonne: she is a positively encouraging influence at the practice. I can't resist, I must mention someone else: his secretary, Roxanne. She registers as highly efficient but not an automaton. Whenever I talk to Roxanne, I know things will be taken care of. I highly recommend acupuncture at the practice of Alex Moroz, MD. SOLI DEO GLORIA!

originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Moroz for many years. I have found him to be one of the
most responsive, caring and solution-oriented doctors I have met. The office recently
moved to the new Center for Musculoskeletal Care, but while the surroundings
are different, the care is the same. Mrs. Joan Grant  I now have a regular treatment
schedule that I maintain to keep pain moderated.

originalText.text:
Dr. Moroz is fantastic! As a long distance runner and triathlete, I came to him with a knee injury that wasn’t responding well enough to weeks of PT. From the moment you sit down with him, you realize that this doctor is not typical, he seems open minded to unconventional treatments. He really listens. He gave me a natural treatment with cabbage leaf that took the inflammation and pain away in a couple of days! He even gave me a high quality elastic band that is needed to wrap my knee for the treatment! I also received valuable advice related to running injury prevention.
Not only did my knee heal very quickly thanks to a single visit to Dr. Moroz, but I went on three months later and ran my first 100 Kilometer (62 mile) ultramarathon!! I finished strong, with no knee issues whatsoever. I am super thankful to Dr. Moroz, he’s very knowledgable, compassionate, and highly recommended!!

originalText.text: Dr. Moroz is dedicated to his patients, upon starting treatment you feel confident that Dr. Moroz's time with you as a patient is unique and tailor to one's needs. Based on my acupunture treatment, after each session I felt comfort and relieved. I can truly recommend Dr. Moroz to anyone for acupuncture, it's the way to go!
